name.ja: <ruby>Ｅｍ<rt>エンタメイジ</rt></ruby>トラピーズ・フォーズ・ウィッチ

text.en:
2 "Performage" monsters
Your opponent cannot target "Performage" monsters you control with card effects, also they cannot be destroyed by your card effects. Your opponent's monsters cannot target this card for attacks while you control a "Performage" monster other than "Performage Trapeze Witch". When an attack is declared involving your "Performage" monster and an opponent's monster: You can make that opponent's monster lose 600 ATK.
